fullplot: Sarah Nolan, a recently divorced thirty-something year old, has a family that just can't help getting involved in her personal life, or lack there of. After her sister puts her profile on PerfectMatch.com, this preschool teacher goes on a number of outrageous and hilarious dates. But will she be able to find the one, who must love dogs?
plot: A forty-something preschool teacher looks to the personals for a change of pace and a relationship, with hilarious results.
title: Must Love Dogs

tomatoes.consensus: Despite good work from its likable leads, the romantic comedy Must Love Dogs is too predictable.
